description: This file defines the 'Intro' page component for a LightningJS application. It renders a UI with title, subtitle, start and help buttons, and a tip message. It also sets up button click handlers to navigate to a quiz page or show tips.

classes.name: Component
classes.description: A LightningJS component class that renders the intro page with UI elements.

methods.name: state
methods.description: Returns the initial state object for the component, including layout metrics, text content, and style properties.

methods.name: components
methods.description: Returns the components used within this component, specifically the Button component.

methods.name: onReady
methods.description: Sets up event handlers for the start and help buttons to handle navigation and display tips.
